name: Figma Plugins - List Of Useful Plugins
description:
This is a list of plugins I use and recommend.


In this file, you will find a bit of reading about plugins why I use them, some of them how to use them, or few tutorials like using one or another plugin.


My main point was to share something with the community and have my list of plugins. And I wanted to encourage you to remix this list and share it with the community.


Update v1.1

  • Added new page to be more specific.
  • My recommendations of plugins are now on a separate page. So that you could make your own generating using my method.
  • Updated a bit plugins card design.

2021-06-05
